cms.dashboard.ui

Class PreferenceConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • cms.dashboard.ui.PreferenceConnector

  • public class PreferenceConnector
extends Object
    This class simplifies the interaction with Application preferences.

    For more information on Preferences refer to SharedPreferences
    Author:
    Parth Patel [parthpatel32@gmail.com]

                String key,
                boolean value)
        Writes given Boolean value to Preference file.
        Parameters:
        context - (Context)
        key - The name of the preference to modify.
        value - The new value for the preference.

      • readBoolean

        public static boolean readBoolean(Context context,
                  String key,
                  boolean defValue)
        Retrieves Boolean value from Preference file.
        Parameters:
        context - (Context)
        key - The name of the preference to read.
        defValue - Value to return if key does not exist in file.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or defValue.

      • writeString

               String key,

        Writes given String value to Preference file.

        value - The new value for the preference.
